Package de.gnwi.jdpdsp.tests.interactions

Class ParticleIndexPairNumberCalculatorForTesting

java.lang.Object
de.gnwi.jdpdsp.utilities.CellBox
de.gnwi.jdpdsp.samples.interactions.ParticlePairInteractionCalculator
de.gnwi.jdpdsp.tests.interactions.ParticleIndexPairNumberCalculatorForTesting
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICalculator, IParticlePairInteractionCalculator
public class ParticleIndexPairNumberCalculatorForTesting extends ParticlePairInteractionCalculator
Particle index pair number calculator that uses ParticlePairInteractionCalculator to determine particle index pairs within a defined cut-off length. NOTE: This calculator is testing purposes only and is NOT used in productive JdpdSP.

  • Nested Class Summary

      aFactory - Factory for new objects
      aSimulationLogger - Simulation logger

      aCutOffLength - Cut-off length for partitioning of the box

  • Method Details

    • calculateParticlePairInteraction

      protected void calculateParticlePairInteraction(int aParticleIndex_i, int aParticleIndex_j, float aRij_x, float aRij_y, float aRij_z, float aRij_Square, RandomAdderGroup aRandomAdderGroup, Parameters aParameters, ParticlePairDistanceParameters aParticlePairDistanceParameters)
      Particle pair interaction calculation NOTE: ParticlePairInteractionCalculator parallelisation guarantees that NO thread-safe implementation of random number generator or float adder is necessary. (No checks are performed)
      Specified by:
      calculateParticlePairInteraction in class ParticlePairInteractionCalculator
      Parameters:
      aParticleIndex_i - Index of particle i
      aParticleIndex_j - Index of particle j
      aRij_x - x[aParticleIndex_i] - x[aParticleIndex_j]
      aRij_y - y[aParticleIndex_i] - y[aParticleIndex_j]
      aRij_z - z[aParticleIndex_i] - z[aParticleIndex_j]
      aRij_Square - Squared distance between particle i and j
      aRandomAdderGroup - Random adder group (NOTE: NOT thread-safe, see above)
      aParameters - Parameters (may be null)
      aParticlePairDistanceParameters - ParticlePairDistanceParameters instance ((may be null)

      Specified by:
      calculateParticlePairInteraction in class ParticlePairInteractionCalculator
      Parameters:
      aParticleIndex_i - Index of particle i
      aParticleIndex_j - Index of particle j
      aRij_x - x[aParticleIndex_i] - x[aParticleIndex_j]
      aRij_y - y[aParticleIndex_i] - y[aParticleIndex_j]
      aRij_z - z[aParticleIndex_i] - z[aParticleIndex_j]
      aRij_Square - Squared distance between particle i and j
      aRij - Distance between particle i and j
      aRandomAdderGroup - Random adder group (NOTE: NOT thread-safe)
